message.entry: COL must contain integers with absolute value between 0 and size(A, 2).
COL must be a full, real vector.
First argument of CATEGORICALSORTROWS must be a full, real matrix of type uint8, uint16 or uint32.
Second argument of CATEGORICALSORTROWS must be a real positive scalar between 0 and intmax(class(X)).
Elements of first argument X of CATEGORICALSORT must be between 0 and N.
